column1: All right, people, I'm in charge now and we will find the terrorists. Jarvis, I want you to check for any terrorist chatter on AOL. Marley and Greggs, try searching for nuclear devices on askjeeves.com.
Are you tellin' me how to do my job?
Chase, search the name Stolfsky on YouTube and cross-reference it with JDate!
We do this my way! I'm the one in charge!
Sir, we have the terrorists' location. IM'ing you now.
